title: Ip always below 60
body:
I've been playing almost 10-12 games and i always get ip below 60-70. When i do bad i get 60 or 70 and when i do good I get below 60. I don't understand i have many kills, one death, some assists and i get 48 or 24 Ip... Anyway to solve this?
Images-:
http://imgur.com/a/35WG2

replies.body: IP isn't granted by assists or kills, but more so how long you played that match.  The[ IP Breakdown Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown) gives an example that 37 minute loss could earn you 68 IP while a 37 minute win could give 100.  New accounts might also get IP and XP faster, and there are other factors too like boosts.  Let me know if that clears things up!
